segments.text: What is the movie you saw last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a new film , ' Transformer ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I expected too high from that movie , but I was a bit disappointed about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I heard the box office rose up to 15 million in the first week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Box office can't explain everything . I do not think it is cheerful or well-made . The plot is old and the female character is not pretty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My sister has given me two tickets for tonight . It is called ' The life of Rose ' , a French movie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It tells the lifetime of a lady singer from a beggar in the street to a famous singer in the world . It is a kind of tragedy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer the tragedy . It is moving and makes me ponder about my life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's go . The time is coming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can buy the popcorn before entering the cinema .
segments.speaker: S2
